post_message: 'For Palestinians to give up the Right of Return- even those who have no intention of ever returning - is to acknowledge that we are lesser beings; that kicking us out of our homes and ripping our hearts out was okay. Palestinian novelist Susan Abulhawa explores the meaning of the Right of Return.
